title: Racist/Innappropriate name
body:
I personally do not think the summoner name of "I AM FOR ALLAH" should be allowed.

Riot please ban this account.

Anyone else who thinks so, please leave a comment and support me.

replies.body:
how is that either of those.
fuck off.
You clearly dont know what Allah means

Allah:
"Christianity. The Aramaic word for "God" in the language of Assyrian Christians is ʼĔlāhā, or Alaha. Arabic-speakers of all Abrahamic faiths, including Christians and Jews, use the word "Allah" to mean "God"."

how is that definition racist/inappropriate?

I don't think it should be banned because it would be racist if it was banned. just like heartvine said.

"Well, it's no different than "I AM FOR GOD" or "I AM FOR THOR", so should those be banned too?"

But don't get me confused for an Allah, because I don't believe in any religion.
HeartVine has a very valid point. Besides that all you can do is report for inappropriate name and let Riot sort it out. Asking to ban the account is a bit harsh also.
Well, it's no different than "I AM FOR GOD" or "I AM FOR THOR", so should those be banned too?
